title: CSS Box Model Essentials
description: Understand how CSS calculates sizes and spacing around elements using margin, border, padding, and content areas.

lessons.title: Content, Padding, Border, Margin
lessons.description: Learn the four layers of the CSS box model and how each affects element dimensions.
lessons.task: Create a div with class 'box' and add 1.25rem padding, a 0.125rem solid #333 border, and 1rem margin.

lessons.title: Box-Sizing Property
lessons.description: Discover how box-sizing changes the box model calculation for width and height.
lessons.task: Set box-sizing: border-box; on the .box element and note how its width includes padding and border.
lessons.previewBaseCSS: body { font-family: sans-serif; } .box { width: 200px; padding: 1rem; border: 0.125rem solid #333; background: #eef; }

lessons.title: Margin Collapse
lessons.description: Understand how vertical margins can collapse between adjacent elements.
lessons.task: Create two stacked divs with class 'box' and 1rem top margin on each. Observe margin collapse.
lessons.previewBaseCSS: body { font-family: sans-serif; } .box { padding: 1rem; background: #ddd; margin-top: 1rem; }

lessons.title: Using Shorthand Properties
lessons.description: Learn to write concise padding and margin using shorthand notation.
lessons.task: Refactor separate margin and padding properties into a single shorthand declaration on .box.
